mapper.select: SELECT * FROM cancellations ORDER BY created_at desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cancellations ( id, orders_id, type, status, reason, refunded_amount, is_confirmed, is_refund, account_number, bank_name, depositor, canceled_at ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{ordersId}, #{type}, #{price}, #{reason}, #{refunded_amount}, #{is_confirmed}, #{is_refund}, #{account_number}, #{bank_name}, #{depositor}, #{canceled_at} )
mapper.update: UPDATE cancellations SET completed_at = now() ,updated_at = now() WHERE id = #{id}
